DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , multi-center study evaluate safety , tolerability , efficacy Intra-Articular ( IA ) verapamil treatment joint pain patient knee osteoarthritis ( OA ) . Subjects discontinue analgesic medication entire duration study , except acetaminophen ( take need basis 2 g/day ) . At visit 2 , subject meet entry criterion randomize receive single injection IA verapamil IA placebo ratio 1:1 . Treatments give fluoroscopy ultrasound confirm needle placement . Subjects monitor blood pressure heart rate ( sit stand ) least 1 hour post-injection . Subjects evaluate week 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 12 treatment .
